Project Description

A complete screensaver that draws pretty hearts. Supports all standard screensaver functionality (preview window, options, multi-monitor).

Written in C# utilizing .NET 4.0 and WPF.

Features

  • Renders hearts in random location that fall down the screen
  • Configurable
    • Target FPS
    • Maximum Hearts
    • Heart Scale
    • Status info (FPS / heart count)
